text: is a Japanese long jumper who won a bronze medal at the 2017 Asian Championships. He placed fifth at the 2018 Asian Games. In 2019, he competed in the men's long jump at the 2019 World Athletics Championships held in Doha, Qatar. He finished in 11th place. ==References== Category:Japanese male long jumpers Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Tokai University alumni Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Japan
title: Shotaro Shiroyama
